strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative that performed an action in which it moved during this turning point, you can re-roll one of your defence dice.

strategy_ploys.name: CEGORACH’S JEST
strategy_ploys.description: Attempts to engage the troupe in melee combat meet with little success. Luckless assailants find their wellaimed strikes meeting only thin air.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative is fighting or retaliating and your opponent strikes with a normal success, you can roll one D6: if the result is less than the Hit stat of your opponent’s selected weapon, that strike is a block instead (ignore the Brutal weapon rule, if relevant) and you cannot use this rule for the rest of the sequence).

firefight_ploys.name: MURDEROUS ENTRANCE
firefight_ploys.description: The Harlequin assault materialises with terrifying speed, a flurry of deadly blows landing before the foe can raise a blade in response.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative is fighting during an activation in which it performed the Charge action, after you strike. You can immediately resolve another of your normal successes as a strike (before your opponent), or one of your critical successes if there are none.

firefight_ploys.name: THE CURTAIN FALLS
firefight_ploys.description: Upon landing a devastating blow, the Harlequin disengages, leaving their wounded opponent flailing desperately in response
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative is fighting, after you strike with a critical success. End that sequence (any remaining attack dice are discarded) and immediately perform a free Dash or Fall Back action up to 3" with that operative (then the Fight action ends). That operative can do so even if it’s performed an action that prevents it from performing the Dash or Fall Back action.

firefight_ploys.name: ELUSIVE TARGET
firefight_ploys.description: Swift, agile and graceful, Harlequins dart from cover to cover, evading their opponents with contemptuous ease.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy during a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative’s activation. Until the start of its next activation, while that operative has a Conceal order and is in cover, it cannot be selected as a valid target, taking precedence over all other rules (e.g. Seek, Vantage terrain) except being within 2".

firefight_ploys.name: DOMINO FIELD
firefight_ploys.description: Harlequins bear a variety of esoteric equipment, including the ubiquitous Domino Field, which breaks up their outline and renders them difficult to target.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when an operative is shooting a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative, during the Resolve Defence Dice step. You can allocate one of your rolled successful dice to block all of your opponent's attack dice with matching results (e.g. one of your successful defence dice results of 5 can be used to block all successful attack dice results of 5).

equipment.name: WRAITHBONE TALISMAN
equipment.description: Charged with psychic power, this item provides fleeting insight to the bearer, enabling them to strike their opponents with unerring accuracy.
equipment.rules: Once per turning point, when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if you roll two or more fails, you can discard one of them to retain another as a normal success instead.

equipment.name: SHRIEKER TOXIN ROUNDS
equipment.description: Coated with virulent genetic toxins, these rounds cause the flesh of the target to twist, distort and rupture to devastating effect.
equipment.rules: Once per turning point, when a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative is performing the Shoot action and you select a shuriken pistol or shrieker cannon (focused), you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that action, that weapon has the Devastating 1 weapon rule.

equipment.name: DEATH MASK
equipment.description: On occasion, a Harlequin must perish in order to fulfil their role in the saedath. Such dedication emboldens those in their troupe that survive.
equipment.rules: Keep a Tragedy tally. Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative that has an ACCOLADE rule is incapacitated, add 1 to your Tragedy tally. When your Tragedy tally reaches 3, you gain 1CP and stop that tally.

equipment.name: UNDERSTUDY’S MASK
equipment.description: This item allows Harlequins to change roles during the saedath. Should one who holds a pivotal role be slain, another will swiftly take their place.
equipment.rules: Once per battle, when you activate a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative, if the friendly operative that has the PIVOTAL ROLE has been incapacitated, you can use this rule. If you do, that activated operative has the PIVOTAL ROLE for the battle.

rules.name: SAEDATH
rules.description: Void-dancer Troupes put on a performance as they attack from the Webway. A single player begins in the pivotal role, then the rest of the troupe progressively join in.
rules.rules:
As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in the first turning point, you must select an ALLEGORY (Epic or Melodrama below) for your kill team for the battle, and one friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative to have the PIVOTAL ROLE for the battle. Whenever a friendly operative has the PIVOTAL ROLE, it has the ACCOLADE rule of your ALLEGORY for the battle.

As a STRATEGIC GAMBIT in each subsequent turning point, you can select one friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative to gain the ACCOLADE rule of your ALLEGORY for the battle.

Once per turning point, when a friendly operative that has the PIVOTAL ROLE completes the performance of your ALLEGORY, you can select one friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative to gain the ACCOLADE rule of your ALLEGORY for the battle.

Epic Performance: The operative incapacitates an enemy operative while fighting. Accolade: Whenever this operative is fighting, its melee weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.
Melodrama Performance: The operative incapacitates an enemy operative while shooting. Accolade: The operative’s ranged weapons have the Balanced weapon rule.

rules.name: HARLEQUIN’S PANOPLY
rules.description: The tools of the Harlequins' trade afford them additional mobility and make them highly difficult to target, enabling them to dodge away from piercing shots of plasma and melta fire.
rules.rules:
Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative, ignore the Piercing weapon rule.
Whenever a friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operative is climbing up, you can treat the vertical distance as 2" (regardless of how far the operative actually moves vertically).

Friendly VOID-DANCER TROUPE operatives can move within control range of enemy operatives (they must still start and end the move following all requirements for that move).

name: WARPCOVEN KILL TEAM
description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.

selection.operatives:
↘ 6 WARPCOVEN operatives selected from the following list:
 * SORCERER OF DESTINY1
 * SORCERER OF TEMPYRION1
 * SORCERER OF WARPFIRE1
 * RUBRIC MARINE GUNNER with one of the following options:
   ○ Warpflamer; fists
   ○ Soulreaper cannon2; fists
 * RUBRIC MARINE ICON BEARER
 * RUBRIC MARINE WARRIOR
 * TZAANGOR CHAMPION3 with one of the following options:
   ○ Greataxe
   ○ Greatblade
 * TZAANGOR HORN BEARER3
 * TZAANGOR ICON BEARER3
 * TZAANGOR WARRIOR3 with one of the following options:
   ○ Tzaangor blades
   ○ Tzaangor blade & shield
   ○ Autopistol; chainsword
You must select at least one friendly SORCERER operative, and one of your selected SORCERER operatives must have the LEADER keyword for the battle. Add 1 to that LEADER operative’s Wounds stat for the battle. Other than WARRIOR and GUNNER operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER operatives.
1 With force stave, PSYCHIC weapons on their datacard and one of the following options:
 * Inferno bolt pistol
 * Prosperine khopesh
 * Warpflame pistol2
2 Your kill team can only include up to one warpflame pistol and up to one soulreaper cannon.
3 These operatives count as half a selection each, meaning you can select both of them and it’s treated as one selection in total.

operatives.name: SORCERER OF DESTINY
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, PSYKER, SORCERER, DESTINY

operatives.name: SORCERER OF TEMPYRION
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, PSYKER, SORCERER, TEMPYRION

operatives.name: TZAANGOR CHAMPION
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, TZAANGOR, CHAMPION

operatives.name: TZAANGOR ICON BEARER
operatives.description: Driven by a desire to accumulate arcane knowledge, Tzaangor hope to use such a prize to gain even more favour with Tzeentch. Particularly fervent Tzaangor carry sinuous icons and banners they believe draw their deity’s gaze and mutative blessings.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, TZAANGOR, ICON BEARER

abilities.name: Herd Banner
abilities.rules: Whenever an attack dice inflicts Normal Dmg of 3 or more on a friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operative that’s visible to and within 3" of this operative, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

abilities.name: Icon Bearer
abilities.rules: Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operative’s APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

operatives.name: RUBRIC MARINE WARRIOR
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, RUBRIC MARINE, WARRIOR

abilities.name: Sorcerous Automata
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is activated, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activation, unless a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operative is within 9" of it.

abilities.name: Slow and Purposeful
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting, if it hasn’t performed the Charge or Reposition action during the activation, or if it's a counteraction, its ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule. Note this operative isn’t restricted from performing these actions after shooting.

operatives.name: TZAANGOR HORN BEARER
operatives.description: Often, a member of a Tzaangor flock will carry a daemonically mawed instrument, the piercing blasts of which stir its fellow creatures into a bestial frenzy. Their shrill cries echo and their horns clatter together as they vie to be first into the fray to hack their victims apart.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, TZAANGOR, HORN BEARER

actions.name: BRAYHORN
effects: Until the Ready step of the next Strategy phase, add 1" to the Move stat of friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR operatives.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: TZAANGOR WARRIOR
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, TZAANGOR, WARRIOR

abilities.name: Relic Hunters
abilities.rules: Once per battle, one friendly WARPCOVEN TZAANGOR WARRIOR can perform the Pick Up Marker, Place Marker or a mission action for 1 less AP if that friendly operative is within your opponent's territory.

operatives.name: RUBRIC MARINE GUNNER
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, RUBRIC MARINE, GUNNER

operatives.name: RUBRIC MARINE ICON BEARER
operatives.description: Many are the dark and terrible secrets of the galaxy, and the Thousand Sons seek to learn them all. Gathering relentless Rubricae and degenerate mutants, Warpcoven kill teams employ sorcery and savagery alike as they sweep aside those who stand in their way.
operatives.keywords: WARPCOVEN, CHAOS, HERETIC ASTARTES, RUBRIC MARINE, ICON BEARER

abilities.name: Sorcerous Automata
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is activated, subtract 1 from its APL stat until the end of that activation, unless a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operative is within 9" of it.

abilities.name: Slow and Purposeful
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting, if it hasn’t performed the Charge or Reposition action during the activation, or if it's a counteraction, its ranged weapons have the Ceaseless weapon rule. Note this operative isn’t restricted from performing these actions after shooting.

strategy_ploys.name: AETHERIAL WARDING
strategy_ploys.description: The Sorcerers of the Thousand Sons ward their warriors with spells, shielding them with a barrier of empyric force.
strategy_ploys.rules: Whenever an operative is shooting a friendly WARPCOVEN operative, weapons with the Piercing 1 weapon rule have the Piercing Crits 1 weapon rule instead.

firefight_ploys.name: ALL IS DUST
firefight_ploys.description: No longer warriors of flesh and blood, the Rubricae are possessed of an unnatural resilience.
firefight_ploys.rules: Whenever an attack dice inflicts damage of 3 or more on a friendly WARPCOVEN RUBRIC MARINE operative, roll one D6: on a 4+, subtract 1 from that inflicted damage.

firefight_ploys.name: CAPRICIOUS PLAN
firefight_ploys.description: The ever-shifting whim of Tzeentch provides opportunity for their servants to change their tactical approach on the fly.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WARPCOVEN operative is activated. That friendly operative can immediately perform a free Dash action (even if it’s performed an action that prevents it from performing the Dash action), and/or you can change its order instead.

firefight_ploys.name: PSYCHIC CABAL
firefight_ploys.description: A Sorcerer may reach out through the warp to channel the latent power of a nearby thrall, focusing the raw empyric energy into a devastating attack.
firefight_ploys.rules: Use this firefight ploy when a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operative performs the Shoot action. Select one other friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operative visible to and within 6" of this operative. That other friendly operative can immediately perform a free Shoot action, but you must select the same weapon and target. You cannot select a PSYCHIC ranged weapon that has been used by that other friendly operative during this turning point, and that other friendly operative cannot use the selected weapon during this turning point.

equipment.name: DAEMONMAW WEAPONS
equipment.description: The weapons of the Rubricae have been warped by millennia spent immersed in the immaterium. Daemonic maws erupt around gun muzzles, their razor beaks serving as effective melee weapons.
equipment.rules: Friendly WARPCOVEN RUBRIC MARINE operatives have the following melee weapon: NAME ATK HIT DMG WR Daemonmaw 4 3+ 4/5 Ceaseless

rules.name: ASTARTES
rules.description: These genetically modified superhumans are made for one purpose: war.
rules.rules:
During each friendly WARPCOVEN HERETIC ASTARTES operative’s activation, it can perform either two Shoot actions or two Fight actions. If it’s two Shoot actions and a soulreaper cannon or a warpflamer is selected for both, 1 additional AP must be spent for the second action. You cannot select the same PSYCHIC ranged weapon more than once per activation.
Each friendly WARPCOVEN HERETIC ASTARTES operative can counteract regardless of its order.

rules.name: BOONS OF TZEENTCH
rules.description: The Lord of Change is the master of sorcery and plots within plots, bestowing upon his favored champions an array of empyric gifts.
rules.rules:
At the end of the Select Operatives step, select one BOON OF TZEENTCH for friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operatives to gain for the battle.
*   Astral Bombardment: Whenever a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operative performs the Shoot action with a PSYCHIC weapon, select the Seek Light or Devastating 1 weapon rule for that weapon to have until the end of the action (it cannot have both).
*   Master of the Immaterium: Increase the Range characteristic of friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operatives’ PSYCHIC ranged weapons by 2" and add 1" to the distance of their PSYCHIC actions.
*   Twist of Fate: Once per turning point, when a friendly WARPCOVEN SORCERER operative is rolling attack dice, you can choose one of your attack dice results and change it to any other result. This can only be done once per dice pool.
*   Warp Swell: Add 1 to the Normal Dmg stat of this operative’s melee weapons.
*   Mutant Appendage: Having an enemy operative within this operative’s control range doesn’t prevent it from performing the Pick Up Marker or mission actions. Once per activation, this operative can perform the Pick Up Marker, Place Marker or a mission action for 1 less AP.
*   Immaterial Flight: Once per turning point, when this operative is performing the Charge or Reposition action during its activation, it can FLY. If it does, don’t move it. Instead, remove it from the killzone and set it back up wholly within a distance equal to its Move stat horizontally of its original location.

name: WRECKA KREW KILL TEAM
description: A Wrecka Krew is a kill team obsessed with one thing – destruction! Arguably the game’s most aggressive team to date, these Orks like nothing better than an Engage order and an enemy operative in their sights.

selection.operatives:
↘ 1 WRECKA KREW BOSS NOB operative with one of the following options:
  ○ Rokkit pistol; smash hammer
  ○ Two rokkit pistols; choppa
↘ 2 WRECKA KREW BOMB SQUIG operatives
↘ 5 WRECKA KREW operatives selected from the following list:
 * BREAKA BOY DEMOLISHA
 * BREAKA BOY FIGHTER
 * BREAKA BOY KRUSHA
 * TANKBUSTA GUNNER with one of the following options:
   ○ ’Eavy rokkit launcha; fists
   ○ Rokkit launcha; fists
 * TANKBUSTA ROKKITEER with one of the following options:
   ○ Rokkit launcha; pulsa rokkit; fists
   ○ Rokkit launcha; rokkit rack; fists
Other than BOMB SQUIG, BREAKA BOY FIGHTER and TANKBUSTA GUNNER operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once.

operatives.name: BOSS NOB
operatives.description: A Wrecka Krew is a kill team obsessed with one thing – destruction! Arguably the game’s most aggressive team to date, these Orks like nothing better than an Engage order and an enemy operative in their sights.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, LEADER, BOSS NOB

abilities.name: Reckless Temperament
abilities.rules: Normal Dmg of 4 or more inflicts 1 less damage on this operative; if this operative has an Engage order, Critical Dmg of 4 or more also inflicts 1 less damage on this operative.

operatives.name: BOMB SQUIG
operatives.description: Orks breed all manner of squigs. The most iconic of these are spherical, bipedal creatures with a large number of teeth and an incredibly bad attitude. Wrecka Krews bring many of these creatures to battle, strapping explosives to them and herding them directly towards the enemy.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BOMB SQUIG

abilities.name: Stoopid
abilities.rules: In the Firefight phase, whenever you determine this operative’s order, you cannot select Conceal. This operative cannot perform any actions other than Charge, Dash, Fight, Reposition and Shoot. It cannot use any weapons that aren’t on its datacard.

abilities.name: Expendable
abilities.rules: This operative is ignored for your opponent’s kill/elimination op (when it’s incapacitated, and when determining your starting number of operatives). It’s also ignored for victory conditions and scoring VPs if either require operatives to ‘escape’, ‘survive’ or be incapacitated by enemy operatives (if it escapes/survives/is incapacitated, determining how many operatives must escape/survive/be incapacitated, etc.).

operatives.name: BREACHA BOY DEMOLISHA
operatives.description: A Wrecka Krew is a kill team obsessed with one thing – destruction! Arguably the game’s most aggressive team to date, these Orks like nothing better than an Engage order and an enemy operative in their sights.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BREACHA BOY, DEMOLISHA

actions.name: BREAK STUFF
effects: Select a terrain feature within this operative’s control range. If it’s an equipment terrain feature, remove it. Otherwise, place one of your Breach markers within this operative’s control range as close as possible to that terrain feature. Whenever an operative is within 1" of that marker, it treats parts of that terrain feature that are no more than 1" thick as Accessible terrain.

operatives.name: BREACHA BOY FIGHTER
operatives.description: A Wrecka Krew is a kill team obsessed with one thing – destruction! Arguably the game’s most aggressive team to date, these Orks like nothing better than an Engage order and an enemy operative in their sights.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BREACHA BOY, FIGHTER

operatives.name: BREACHA BOY KRUSHA
operatives.description: A Wrecka Krew is a kill team obsessed with one thing – destruction! Arguably the game’s most aggressive team to date, these Orks like nothing better than an Engage order and an enemy operative in their sights.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, BREACHA BOY, KRUSHA

operatives.name: TANKBUSTA GUNNER
operatives.description: A Wrecka Krew is a kill team obsessed with one thing – destruction! Arguably the game’s most aggressive team to date, these Orks like nothing better than an Engage order and an enemy operative in their sights.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, TANKBUSTA, GUNNER

weapons.name: ’EAVY ROKKIT LAUNCHA
weapons.rules: N/A - Stats not provided in source

operatives.name: TANKBUSTA ROKKITEER
operatives.description: Unsatisfied with the amount of firepower of a simple rokkit launcha, Tankbusta Rokkiteers have spent all their teef on additional explody gubbinz in the form of rokkit racks and pulsa rokkits. The latter is a particularly nasty weapon that knocks those caught in its blast radius from their feet, allowing the Orks to close in and club any survivors to death.
operatives.keywords: WRECKA KREW, ORK, TANKBUSTA, ROKKITEER

weapons.name: PULSA ROKKIT
weapons.rules: N/A - Stats not provided in source. Knocks target from feet.

weapons.name: ROKKIT RACK
weapons.rules: N/A - Stats not provided in source.

equipment.name: ENGINE OIL
equipment.description: Wrecka Krews are known to ingest the oils of vehicles they have destroyed. The intoxicating fluid bolsters their natural resilience.
equipment.rules: Once per turning point, when a friendly WRECKA KREW operative (excluding BOMB SQUIG) is activated, you can use this rule. If you do, until the end of that activation, you can ignore any changes to that operative’s stats from being injured (including its weapons’ stats).

equipment.name: GLYPHS
equipment.description: Back-banners, crude markings and glyph-scrawled armour proudly display the Wrecka Krew’s favoured method of destruction.
equipment.rules: Once per battle, after rolling off to decide initiative, you can use this rule. If you do, your opponent cannot re-roll their attack dice results of 1 this turning point, and friendly WRECKA KREW operatives cannot be incapacitated by enemy operatives’ Critical Dmg results of 5 or more for the battle.

rules.name: WRECKA RAMPAGE
rules.description: The sound of explosions, the acrid stench of smoke and the screams of battle drive Wrecka Krews forwards to ever more destructive acts.
rules.rules:
Whenever a friendly WRECKA KREW operative (excluding BOMB SQUIG) performs the Shoot or Fight action during its activation, if it wasn’t incapacitated, you gain 1 Wrecka point. Wrecka points are used for the following:
*   1 Wrecka point: Add 1 to this operative’s APL stat until the start of its next activation.
*   2 Wrecka points: This operative regains up to D3 lost wounds.
*   3 Wrecka points: Until the start of its next activation, this operative has the Grim Resolve and Indomitable Guard abilities (see Kill Team Core Book).
You can gain and spend Wrecka points during the same action and can do so in an order of your choice, unless you started the action with 6, in which case you can only spend them.
At the end of each turning point, remove all Wrecka points.

name: WYRMBLADE KILL TEAM
description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.

selection.operatives:
↘ 1 WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE LEADER operative with one of the following:
  ○ Master-crafted autopistol; power pick
  ○ Web pistol; power maul
  ○ Autogun; gun butt
  ○ Shotgun; chainsword
  ○ Bolt pistol; power maul
↘ 9 WYRMBLADE operatives selected from the following list:
 * KELERMORPH (counts as two selections)
 * LOCUS (counts as two selections)
 * NEOPHYTE GUNNER with one of the following options:
   ○ Flamer; gun butt
   ○ Grenade launcher; gun butt
   ○ Webber; gun butt
 * NEOPHYTE HEAVY GUNNER with one of the following options:
   ○ Heavy stubber; gun butt
   ○ Mining laser; gun butt
   ○ Seismic cannon; gun butt
 * ICON BEARER with one of the following options:
   ○ Autogun; gun butt
   ○ Shotgun; gun butt
 * SANCTUS SNIPER (counts as two selections)
 * SANCTUS TALON (counts as two selections)
 * WARRIOR with one of the following options:
   ○ Autogun; gun butt
   ○ Shotgun; gun butt
Other than WARRIOR operatives, your kill team can only include each operative on this list once. Your kill team can only include up to two GUNNER operatives, up to two HEAVY GUNNER operatives and up to two CULT AGENT operatives.

operatives.name: NEOPHYTE LEADER
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, LEADER

abilities.name: Shadow Vector
abilities.rules: Once per turning point, you can use the Slink Into Darkness or Coiled Serpent firefight ploy for 0CP if the specified friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operative is a NEOPHYTE visible to this operative.

operatives.name: KELERMORPH
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, KELERMORPH

abilities.name: Expert Gunslinger
abilities.rules: This operative can perform two Shoot actions during its activation.

abilities.name: Heroic Inspiration
abilities.rules: Whenever a friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operative visible to and within 3" of this operative is shooting, fighting or retaliating, if this operative has incapacitated an enemy operative during this turning point, that friendly operative’s weapons have the Severe weapon rule.

operatives.name: LOCUS
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, LOCUS

abilities.name: Expert Swordsman
abilities.rules: This operative can perform two Fight actions during its activation. Whenever this operative ends the Fight action, if it’s no longer within control range of enemy operatives, it can immediately perform a free Charge action (even if it’s already performed the Charge action during that activation), but it cannot move more than 3" during that action. Doing so doesn’t prevent it from performing the Dash action afterwards during that activation.

operatives.name: NEOPHYTE GUNNER
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, GUNNER

operatives.name: NEOPHYTE HEAVY GUNNER
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, HEAVY GUNNER

weapons.name: SEISMIC CANNON (SHORT-WAVE)
weapons.rules: Range 6", Heavy (Dash only), Piercing Crits 1, Stun

abilities.name: Heavy Weapon Bipod
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is shooting with a weapon from its datacard, if it hasn’t moved during the activation, or if it’s a counteraction, that weapon has the Ceaseless weapon rule; if the weapon already has that weapon rule (i.e. from the Cult Ambush faction rule), it has the Relentless weapon rule. Note this operative isn’t restricted from moving after shooting.

operatives.name: NEOPHYTE ICON BEARER
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, ICON BEARER

abilities.name: Icon Bearer
abilities.rules: Whenever determining control of a marker, treat this operative’s APL stat as 1 higher. Note this isn't a change to its APL stat, so any changes are cumulative with this.

abilities.name: Overthrow the Oppressors
abilities.rules: Once per turning point, when a ready friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operative is incapacitated while visible to and within 6" of this operative, you can use this rule. If you do, before that operative is removed from the killzone, it can either perform one free Shoot action (you can change its order to do so), or you can use the A Plan Generations in the Making firefight ploy for 0CP if that incapacitated operative is the specified friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operative. It's then removed from the killzone as normal.

operatives.name: SANCTUS SNIPER
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, SANCTUS, SNIPER

actions.name: TARGET VULNERABILITY
effects: Until the end of this operative’s activation, the stationary profile of its Sanctus sniper rifle has the Lethal 5+ weapon rule.
conditions: This operative cannot perform this action while within control range of an enemy operative.

operatives.name: SANCTUS TALON
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, CULT AGENT, SANCTUS, TALON

abilities.name: Creeping Shadow
abilities.rules: This operative can perform the Charge action while it has a Conceal order. Whenever this operative performs the Fight action, it can immediately perform a free Dash or Fall Back action afterwards (for the latter, it cannot move more than 3"), even if it’s performed an action that prevents it from performing those actions.

operatives.name: NEOPHYTE WARRIOR
operatives.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
operatives.keywords: WYRMBLADE, TYRANIDS, GENESTEALER CULTS, NEOPHYTE, WARRIOR

abilities.name: Group Activation
abilities.rules: Whenever this operative is expended, you must then activate one other ready friendly WYRMBLADE WARRIOR operative (if able) before your opponent activates. When that other operative is expended, your opponent then activates as normal (in other words, you cannot activate more than two operatives in succession with this rule).

equipment.name: BLASTING CHARGES
equipment.description: Mining equipment becomes deadly weaponry in the hands of the Wyrmblade.
equipment.rules:
Once per turning point, a friendly WYRMBLADE NEOPHYTE operative can use the following ranged weapon:
NAME ATK HIT DMG WR Blasting charge 4 3+ 4/5 Range 6", Blast 1", Limited 1, Piercing 1, Saturate

rules.name: FAMILIAR TERRITORY
rules.description: Genestealer Cults infiltrate all stratas of Imperial society, accumulating knowledge of transit routes, passageways and hidden tunnels by which they may outmanoeuvre their foes.
rules.rules:
When setting up a WYRMBLADE kill team before the battle, one third of your kill team can be set up in HIDING: place them to one side instead of in the killzone. CULT AGENT operatives cannot be set up in HIDING.
At the start of the first turning point, after the Strategy phase, operatives that were set up in HIDING can land. To do so, for each such operative, select a location in the killzone wholly within 3" of a friendly operative that was set up as normal (or your drop zone if no such operative remains). Set up the operative in that location. It cannot move more than 3" during its activation in this turning point.
